Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I have the game for almost a year now. I'm not very good at it but no matter, I'm enjoying myself!

The MPL can give a terrific amount of science points but I've noticed that it's possible for a second 1 to process the same experiments again. It feels kind of "cheatty" to me. Now, I haven't send the science points from both MPL's back to the KSC yet so correct me if I'm wrong, but isn't this a very easy way to fill out the techtree. Am I overlooking something here? If this is possible is there a way to turn off the ability to do this? 

Thanks in advance and happy flying everyone.

It is extremely easy and is very over powered. To limit this for myself I have decided to only process physical samples (surface samples, atmospheric samples). You could do the same or you could go into the mpl's cfg and change some of the processing values.
I would like a way to nerf the MPL to only generate science for the time spent in realtime, and ignore warp. Could this be achieved by some magical module manager cfg?
